alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:22PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Elko and north central Eureka Counties through 545 PM PDT... At 521 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles northwest of Carlin to 11 miles west of Ryndon to Elko. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elko, Ryndon, and Adobe Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
